name: Spider-Man 2099 -->
powersText: Superhuman strength, speed, agility, reflexes, durability, and hearing Enhanced healing and health Enhanced vision (telescopic and night-vision) Genius-level intelligence Talons on fingers and toes that enable wall-crawling, act as weapons, and can be folded down Organic webbing from forearms Temporary-paralysis venom from fangs Wears indestructible costume of unstable molecule fabric with air-foil that allows gliding
